word.description: {白糖} is *white sugar* ({白} is *white*, and {糖} is *sugar*).

images.place: Ping Pang Pong, Las Vegas, Nevada

description: A fluffy, deep-fried spherical pastry coated in sugar. Also known as *Chinese donuts*, *Chinese doughnuts*, *Chinese egg puffs*, *Chinese sugar egg puffs*, and even *Chinese beignet*.

word.Yale: náaih wòhng nàahm gwā sā yūng
word.Pinyin: nǎi huáng nán guā shā wēng
word.description: {奶} is *milk*, and {黃} is *yellow*, so {嬭黃} is *milk yellow* or *custard*. 南瓜 is “pumpkin.” 沙翁 is a Chinese doughnut. So it's “custard pumpkin doughnut.”

images.place: Tim Ho Wan, Las Vegas, Nevada

description: A pumpkin-flavored Chinese doughnut with a custard filling. I've only seen these at [Tim Ho Wan](http://www.timhowanusa.com/), listed in English as *pumpkin roll*.
